entry.title: 浅谈2021CUPT膜上球
entry.content:
Ball on the Membrane 膜上球

题目回顾

When dropping a metal ball on a rubber membrane stretched over a plastic cup, a sound can be heard. Explain the origin of this sound and explore how its characteristics depend on relevant parameters.
将金属球扔在塑料杯子上延展的橡胶薄膜上时，可以听到声音。解释这种声音的起源，并探讨其特征如何取决于相关参数。

entry.title: My First Blog
entry.content:
My First Blog

Why I want to establish my blog

First, I think sharing knowledge on this blog can help me expand the width and depth of my knowledge. The most important reason of establishing my blog is to communicate with those who have the same questions as me. I believe communication can improve both of us. So, I am glad to recieve comments from browsers.

Second, I want to use this blog to discipline myself and push me to study harder. Before long, I will upload my monthly plans and summarys on this platform. Hope everyone can supervise my study and works.

last, many Mr.big have their personal blogs and upload marvelous passeges on it. So, I think if I want to be one of them, imitating how they learn can be a good start.

How I establish my blog

After confirmed I want to have my own blog, I searched the methods of establishing personal blog
on the internet. Many answers recommended github pages plus hexo. From these answers, I knowed that the advantage of github pages plus hexo is individuation and for free. That’s what I want. So I choose it.

Here are some links(very detailed) about how to establish your personal blog:

(1)使用Github Pages和Hexo搭建自己的独立博客

(2)Hexo+GitHub-page=My_Blog!

When I followed these guidances and built my blog, some unexpected mistakes happened like this page(hexo部署博客后只显示网址怎么办？) described. Then I found that it was my settings that were wrong. When you create a new repository, you should change the branches from main to master. Here is the solution in detail(github_修改当前仓库的默认分支).

What I want to share on my blog

I am a student majored in physics and I am also interested in math, cs and literature (both Chinese and foreign literature). So, I want to share knowledge about physics, math and cs I learned during my college study and also some personal feelings after reading books.

To Be Continue……
